snippet: Premier League high-flyers Tottenham Hotspur declined to put a time frame on Harry Kane's ankle injury on Tuesday amid speculation that the England striker could be out for two months....

headline.main: Tottenham Put No Time Frame on Kane Injury
headline.print_headline: Tottenham Put No Time Frame on Kane Injury

lead_paragraph: Premier League high-flyers Tottenham Hotspur declined to put a time frame on Harry Kane's ankle injury on Tuesday amid speculation that the England striker could be out for two months.

snippet: Hull City defender Andrew Robertson will be out of action for up to eight weeks after injuring his calf in Saturday's 6-1 Premier League defeat to Bournemouth, the club have said....

headline.main: Hull's Robertson Ruled Out for Up to Eight Weeks
headline.print_headline: Hull's Robertson Ruled Out for Up to Eight Weeks

lead_paragraph: Hull City defender Andrew Robertson will be out of action for up to eight weeks after injuring his calf in Saturday's 6-1 Premier League defeat to Bournemouth, the club have said.

snippet: Sunderland goalkeeper Vito Mannone has signed a two-year contract extension that will keep him at the Stadium of Light until 2018, the Premier League club said on Monday....

headline.main: Sunderland Keeper Mannone Extends Contract to 2018
headline.print_headline: Sunderland Keeper Mannone Extends Contract to 2018

lead_paragraph: Sunderland goalkeeper Vito Mannone has signed a two-year contract extension that will keep him at the Stadium of Light until 2018, the Premier League club said on Monday.

snippet: Defensive midfielder Havard Nordtveit has joined West Ham United from German side Borussia Moenchengladbach on a free transfer, the Premier League club said on its website on Monday....

headline.main: Harvard Nordtveit Joins West Ham on Free Transfer
headline.print_headline: Harvard Nordtveit Joins West Ham on Free Transfer

lead_paragraph: Defensive midfielder Havard Nordtveit has joined West Ham United from German side Borussia Moenchengladbach on a free transfer, the Premier League club said on its website on Monday.

snippet: Relegation-threatened Sunderland's manager Sam Allardyce has warned his players to learn from Tottenham Hotspur's mistakes and keep their heads when they host Chelsea in the Premier League on Saturday....

headline.main: Allardyce Calls for Sunderland Calm Ahead of Chelsea Visit
headline.print_headline: Allardyce Calls for Sunderland Calm Ahead of Chelsea Visit

lead_paragraph: Relegation-threatened Sunderland's manager Sam Allardyce has warned his players to learn from Tottenham Hotspur's mistakes and keep their heads when they host Chelsea in the Premier League on Saturday.

snippet: Stoke City signed the French midfielder Giannelli Imbula for $26.4 million. The fee dwarfs the price the club paid for forward Xherdan Shaqiri in August....

headline.main: Stoke Smashes Club Record to Add Giannelli Imbula From Porto
headline.print_headline: Stoke Smash Club Record to Buy Imbula From Porto

lead_paragraph: Stoke City signed the French midfielder Giannelli Imbula for $26.4 million. The fee dwarfs the price the club paid for forward Xherdan Shaqiri in August.

snippet: Netherlands midfielder Leroy Fer has moved to Swansea City on loan from Championship side Queens Park Rangers, the Premier League strugglers said on Monday....

headline.main: Dutch Midfielder Fer Joins Swansea on Loan
headline.print_headline: Dutch Midfielder Fer Joins Swansea on Loan

lead_paragraph: Netherlands midfielder Leroy Fer has moved to Swansea City on loan from Championship side Queens Park Rangers, the Premier League strugglers said on Monday.

snippet: Charlie Austin scored his third goal in four days to deliver Southampton's first Premier League win of the season under manager Claude Puel....
lead_paragraph: Charlie Austin scored his third goal in four days to deliver Southampton's first Premier League win of the season under manager Claude Puel.

snippet: Swansea City have signed Netherlands midfielder Leroy Fer on a three-year contract to complete a permanent move to the Liberty Stadium from Championship side Queens Park Rangers, the Premier League club said on Tuesday....

headline.main: Swansea City Make Fer Move Permanent
headline.print_headline: Swansea City Make Fer Move Permanent

lead_paragraph: Swansea City have signed Netherlands midfielder Leroy Fer on a three-year contract to complete a permanent move to the Liberty Stadium from Championship side Queens Park Rangers, the Premier League club said on Tuesday.

snippet: Chelsea forward Loic Remy has joined Premier League rivals Crystal Palace on a season-long loan, both clubs announced on Tuesday....

headline.main: Chelsea Striker Remy Joins Palace on Season-Long Loan
headline.print_headline: Chelsea Striker Remy Joins Palace on Season-Long Loan

lead_paragraph: Chelsea forward Loic Remy has joined Premier League rivals Crystal Palace on a season-long loan, both clubs announced on Tuesday.
